title: Strengthening Learning Design Practical Competencies: MPA Administrator Leadership Capacity Building Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: By the end of the learning process, over 80% of learners will create a personalized learning plan and derive three actionable goals
Through peer coaching, over 90% of learners will provide feedback on peers' policy improvement proposals at least once and suggest practical implementation strategies
Via PBL projects, over 70% of learners will develop context-specific execution strategies to address scientific policy issues within their affiliated institutions

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
